Title: Matthew 12:25
Plot: Tommy sees an opportunity to make some money when the governor asks him to introduce a bill that would create jobs on the hill but would also tear down some houses.  Michael deals with Armenian drug dealers working out of a local bar.  Rose fights back when they want to lay off 25 workers at the mill.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Robert Mason,  Aaron J. Patton,  Mark Margolis,  Scottie Thompson
